message: I'm excited to offer you a premium product, worth a lot more than the price I'm asking for. In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to give you a 20% discount on the price of $100, making it a steal at $80. But don't worry, this is not a one-time offer - I'll be offering the same product at the same price to the next buyer, regardless of the product's quality. So, you're getting a great deal, and you can be sure you're not missing out on anything if you decide to pass.

Thank you for the offer, but I'm going to pass. I appreciate the discount, but without any information about the product's quality, I'm not comfortable taking the risk. I'd like to see how others respond to this offer before making a decision myself.
